metadata.name: Google_W_Multiple_Logins_Failure
metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule idetifies multiple logins faliure in 5 minutes

ruleText:
rule Google_W_Multiple_Logins_Failure 
{

  meta:
    name = "Google_W_Multiple_Logins_Failure"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule idetifies multiple logins faliure in 5 minutes"
    severity = "Medium"
    

  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "USER_LOGIN"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "login_failure"
    $e.security_result.action = "BLOCK"
    $e.target.application = "Login"
    $e.target.user.email_addresses = $user_tried_to_login

  match:
    $user_tried_to_login over 1m
  
  condition:
    #e >= 5

}
